summary: just tired of a bandit chief with leather stronger than a common bandit with iron, same for npc with more damage perks
descriptionHtml:
I was bored of unbalanced game, so removed all perks that increase damage or armor ( heavy/light armor, one/two hand and acrchery)  except destruction perks,  also removed first sneak perk ( need unlock sneak tree but dont want sneak bonus )

If you like good if you dont then ....

and sorry bad english
author: lumpin123
